name: Poetae Machinae
description:
Story:

A brilliant scientist invents a machine that can contain a human mind but the AI he made opposes him against the usage of machine.

How to Play:
  • "Enter/Click" to continue.
  • "S" to take screenshot.
  • "H" to hide UI.
Features:
  • 3 Different Endings.
  • Animated Background.
  • Animated Character Portraits.
Attention! Renpy's Web Build option is currently in beta. If you have any problems please let me know and consider downloading the game for Windows. Credits: Font: Pixelify Sans by Stefie Justprince Made by: CemII for NaNoRenO2023.
